Irregular Verbs Challenge

Developed and debugged Single Page Web Application using JavaScript, HTML5 & CSS3, PHP, MySQL, and AJAX (Update: now runs on Vue.js, Vuetify, and Firebase) to assist ESL people in learning English irregular verbs through a competitive word game.

A Web Server

Set up an Apache webserver based on “Raspberry Pi” computer with supporting MySQL and PHP for hosting Irregular Verbs Challenge project.

Bus-Tracker

Developing front-end for Single Page Web Application using Vue.js (Vue Router, Vuex), RestAPI (Axios), to provide a transport business a tool to keep its accounting.
